string.text: Stalker, you're coming up to the Barrier, don't dare spoil it, but we're happy to accept any help.
"Swordsman, come to us for the calculation and further instructions."
Swordsman, come back and take a position
If you spend a whole night in the village on the Tower, something MUST happen...
Remember the mines - the sapper makes two mistakes...
Swordsman be careful - they say there's a new anomaly in the village - it moves very fast, in addition to her asshole is not visible.
Attention all who wish to liquefy brains - the passage to the Radar guard detachment Monolith, I think you know that they shoot at everything. Good luck.
Let's attack, gang. Let's kill the lawmen.
Our task is done. Let's go back to the farm and settle our accounts there.
Let's go, guys. The way is clear.
Swordsman, take care of the snipers !!!
Swordsman, be careful, or you might get hit in the head with a bullet...
